item.title: Hugo Post Template
item.description: Links Easy use of Markdown. To display a link, the plaintext in *.md [Google](https://www.google.com/) renders as Google Code Blocks Add pygmentsUseClasses = true to config.toml. This is default in hermit. To display a code block, the plaintext in *.md renders as def fibonacci(n): if n <= 1: return n else: return(fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)) TeX Can't use .md, use .mmark as extension of document. Add to header of *.mmark markup = mmark.
